a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: GDP per capita: Comparing data from World Bank and Penn World Table,
This data is adjusted for inflation and differences in the cost of living between countries.
Data source: Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank; Feenstra et al. (2015), Penn World Table (2021)
Note: This data is expressed in international-$ at 2017 prices. Penn World Table uses multiple benchmark years to adjust for differences in
the cost of living between countries over time.
